title: How to unsubscribe from Google One
description: You can cancel your Google One membership through the Google One app or website. Follow these steps to cancel your subscription and manage your storage plan.

web.title: Cancel Google One Subscription via Web
web.description:
To cancel your Google One subscription via the web:

*   Go to one.google.com/settings.
*   Tap or click on Settings.
*   Tap or click on Cancel membership.
*   Confirm by tapping or clicking Cancel membership.
*   To downgrade to basic Google One storage plans (100 GB, 200 GB), go to https://one.google.com/changestorageplan.
*   To delete your plan from your Google Account, go to https://myaccount.google.com/deleteservices.

app.title: Cancel Google One Subscription via App
app.description:
To cancel your Google One subscription via the app:

*   Open the Google One app.
*   Tap on Settings.
*   Tap on Cancel membership.
*   Confirm by tapping Cancel membership.

ios.title: Cancel Google One Subscription via App Store (iOS)
ios.description:
To cancel your Google One subscription through the App Store:

*   Open the App Store app.
*   Tap your name.
*   Tap Subscriptions.
*   Tap Google One.
*   Tap Cancel Subscription.

seo_text: Learn how to cancel your Google One subscription. Follow our step-by-step guide to easily cancel your Google One membership through the app, website, or App Store. Manage your Google One storage plan and subscription settings.
